thread.title: Tom Cruise attends Florida-LSU game, supposedly gives interview from urinal
thread.title_full: Tom Cruise attends Florida-LSU game, supposedly gives interview from urinal - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Tom Cruise attends Florida-LSU game, supposedly gives interview from urinal
text:
. @TomCruise at the LSU game#TOMCRUISE#GEAUXTIGERS#LSUTIGERS https://t.co/kAW8toxQl4 pic.twitter.com/GXCRkuiaMr
— Tom Cruise Blog (@tomcruiseblog) October 19, 2015 Tom Cruise was spotted at Florida-LSU game in Baton Rouge Saturday night. What's more, sources say it was Cruise's first college football game.
The star is in the Pelican State, filming his upcoming movie "Jack Reacher: Never Go Back" in New Orleans.
One journalist, Ross Dellenger with Baton Rouge's newspaper The Advocate, reportedly had an impromptu interview with the actor at -- where else? -- a urinal in the stadium.
Tom Cruise, during our pee together, on #LSU game (his first CFB game): "Memorable. Exciting. Everything else will pale in comparison."
— Ross Dellenger (@DellengerAdv) October 18, 2015 For what it's worth, the Tigers won, 35-28.
